content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Furnace at position (x)
Consists of the following entities:
- Furnace (position x1)

### Coal mine at position (x)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner mining drill (position x1)

### Iron plate factory at position (x)
Consists of the following entities:
- Assembling machine (position x1)
- Inserter (position x2) that puts into the assembling machine
- Beltgroup (position x3) that connects the furnace (position x1) to the assembling machine (position x1)

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors when trying to craft items without sufficient ingredients
- Ensure you have enough of the required ingredients in your inventory before attempting to craft items. In this case, you need at least 2 iron plates to craft 1 iron gear wheel.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting placing. 

### Errors when crafting items that require machines
- Verify that you have the necessary machines (like furnaces or assembling machines) available and that they are properly set up to craft the desired items.
